amendment.description: To facilitate nationwide availability of 2-1-1 telephone service for information on and referral to human services, including volunteer opportunities related to human services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 4957 ruled non-germane by the chair.

Amendment SA 4957 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S9475-9476; text: CR S9475-9476) To facilitate nationwide availability of 2-1-1 telephone service for information on and referral to human services, including volunteer opportunities related to human services, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4957 proposed by Senator Clinton.
